name: A Chase Through Time
description:
When your pet caterpillar is murdered by a strange traveller, you are forced to track him down to take your revenge. Go through two stages and fight him at the end to get revenge. You also have the ability to rewind your own time. When you do so your past self will try to kill you. If you kill him you will receive extra health.

Game was made for Brackey's Game Jam 2020 

Game was made by: Ben Kerr (art and programming), Jeremy Trendoff(art, sound and programming) and Alex Pacheco (sound)
